div.p: This provides a list of changes to the Digital Documentation of COVID-19 Certificates (DDCC) Implementation Guide (IG) since its initial release.

ul.li: Release with publication of DDCC: Test Result guidance.
Merge of draft DDCC: Test Result branch with DDCC: Vaccination Status content.
Public release of DDCC: Vaccination Status guidance.
Change from Smart Vaccination Certificate IG to DDCC IG.
Updated based on feedback from public comment release and changed name to DDCC.
